I do miss having an electronic viewfinder, but I'm getting used to the "new" method with each use.

Reviews.Title: So far a really great camera!
Reviews.Author: Shawn Powers "Shawn Ishness"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera about 3 weeks ago and have really liked it. Its resolution seems very good for pics, but at full resolution the movie file sizes are rather big. A 9 minute movie was over 2gb long and Windows 8 choked on it :/ Nonetheless, for the price, it's been a very great camera and I'd definitely recommend it :D.... But, you may not really need to install the software that comes with it. I did, but I suspect Windows 8 will recognize the camera without the software installation, and I prefer using ACDSee for all my picture viewing and archiving maintenance activities.

Reviews.Title: Zoom Images not very clear or focused
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera a couple weeks ago for it's 24x zoom and high megapixle image.When taking a picture close up, it seems to be ok.  But when I use the 24x optical zoom, on a tripod, the image does not seem to focus very well.  The pictures come back just a tad grainy or blurry.  It's like digital zoom instead of optical zoom.  Not very happy with the results of the zoom.Also, in direct sunlight, the pictures tend to be bleached making it hard to distinguish details in the picture.  And that is with the sun behind me. I haven't had this problem with other cameras.  Not sure if there is another setting that would work better.I also wasn't very happy that the camera didn't come with an sd card, even a small one.  Had the description mentioned that, it would have saved me time buying one.  My previous camera came with one.

Reviews.Title: Great value camera
Reviews.Author: Ranch Cook
Reviews.Content: I know I've been behind the times for more than a few years when it comes to converting to digital so I wanted to make sure that the camera I bought would do a lot of things well. Distance, Macro, etc. with many options for controlling virtually everything, but still having great automatic settings.  Having used this camera now for quite a number of months I can say that it is very easy to use and it also holds a charge very well.  Although I purchased an extra battery pack just in case, I haven't had to use it yet.  I know that this camera will meet my needs for a long time to come.  Very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix S4200 Camera
Reviews.Author: james ball
Reviews.Content: I have been very pleased with my purchase of this camera. It is very easy to operate and has many effects and options desirable for so many applications. I was very satisfied with the speed at which the order was  sent . I would buy from this seller again and suggest them to friends.

Reviews.Title: Fuji film
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: Great item!!!!! I bought it for my fiancé for his birthday...I purchased the camera on July 30th and got it on Aug. 1st  that was so awesome!

Reviews.Title: Serious Camera
Reviews.Author: G. R. Stetson "Bookophile"
Reviews.Content: Pluses--- PRICE  Plenty of resolutionMinuses---More complicated than I need  On-off switch not very reliable  No paper manual  No long exposure option

Reviews.Title: This Camera ROCKS! s4200
Reviews.Author: C. Olsen "Sim Fanatic"
Reviews.Content: This thing takes some amazing shots! I'm still learning the manual features and there are already some Great reviews on here so I will just say, my only regret so far is for about 5 dollars more I could have got the s4500, and I should have. 24x zoom is AMAZING. I was able to get shots of the craters on the moon! The 30x most definitely would require a tripod. 16gb Class 10 stores about 2900 HD shots. Only little over 9 min of vid though. I got Eneloop (White ones, low discharge) and I've shot about 150 pics and no battery warning light yet. BTW, this Camera is pretty small, and fits PERFECT in the Case Logic DCB-304.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Michael T. Gallant "MTG"
Reviews.Content: This camera has many features you would expect on a more expensive camera. The pictures come out great. I am very happy with the macro setting. The 30X optical zoom is fantastic. The camera does drain batteries so I recommend picking up some NiMH (1800 mAh or greater) rechargeable batteries. There are several vendors on Amazon that sell good quality Tenergy brand NiMH batteries at a ridiculously low price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!  Good Value for Money
Reviews.Author: Frank Eckert
Reviews.Content: Camera was ordered to replace an older digital camera. Wanted one with extra features but not too complicated to use.  Have had it for two weeks and it works fine. Pictures are clear, focused properly and the zoom is amazing. Really lets you get a good shot. I strongly recommend reading manual first to understand how it works and spend at least 30 minutes working out the settings using the manual on different areas. You also need to hold down button half way to allow for focus before shooting. This is similar to other cameras I have had in past. In checking on power use suggest using lithium batteries instead of others. While it does take a bit of getting used to feel it will meet our needs. The facial recognition feature with blink is really nice as it tells you if person blinked during shot.

Reviews.Title: The Camera is great
Reviews.Author: Brad Ek
Reviews.Content: The 45oo is just what I expected. I've had Fujifilm cameras before and this is another step up. I use it for work and family photos. The 30 x zoom comes in handy for both.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!!
Reviews.Author: Michael K. Harper
Reviews.Content: The camera was just as described and performs even better than expectations. I bought it as a gift for my wife and she was beyond excited. Thanks greatly!!

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm S4500 digital camera
Reviews.Author: Walter M. Daniels
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with this camera. My previous digital only had a viewingscreen on the back, which made it impossible to take pictures is abright light situation. This camera offers a through the lens viewingthat solves that problem very well.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: Norman L. Kilpatrick
Reviews.Content: The camera was delivered on time as promised.  I am just now getting used to the operation of the camera, but it seems simple enough for all the options it has.  I am sure I am going like it.

Reviews.Title: I was looking and finally found it!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Dimock
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  Awesome zoom and the pictures come out so crystal clear.  This was exactly what I was looking for, especially the great price!  People seeing me use this camera often mistake it for an SLR!  My daughter has an SLR and was very impressed with my new camera.  Shipping, by the way, was fabulous.  The camera arrived sooner than expected!  The only problem I have is closing the battery and card compartment.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Stetson
Reviews.Content: I really LOVE this camera.  I wanted an affordable digital camera but didn't want the trade-off of cost to mean limited features or quality.  This camera has wonderful features and still takes great quality pictures in all lighting situations.  Very pleased and definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: did not work
Reviews.Author: victor
Reviews.Content: I recieved this camera two days before leaving on vacation.  I had not bought a new camera in 7 years and felt it was time for an upgrade.  After reading the reviews I felt I was making the best decision for my needs.  I opened the camera, put in the batteries and memory card, fired it up and took my first picture.  Then the camera shut off and never turned back on,  I changed the batteries, tried a new memory card, nothing completely dead.  What a disappointment, now I have to run around after work and buy a camera.  The selection of products and thankfully the top notch return policy for amazon is amazing so I am not looking forward to going to best buy and walmart to find a camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price. I would recommend this camera to for those who are on a low budget and are looking for decent pictures.

Reviews.Title: takes crystal clear pictures
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Hanks
Reviews.Content: This camera has brought back a hobby that I have long enjoyed. With the cost of film and developing I had almost stopped using my old 35mm camera but now I am enjoying taking pictures and am able to store them right to my computer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera with great computerized functions.
Reviews.Author: W. K. Smith
Reviews.Content: Still learning all the in and outs of this camera that's because it can do some may things.  I really like the auto zoom feature which will increase the zoom by half again and then double it in 3 shot sequence all done automatically. I also found the auto panorama mode to be one of the easiest I've every used.  Take one shot then just align the crosses in the view finder together and it will automatically take the next picture.  It works like a champ! Be prepared to do some work reading the instruction manual which can be downloaded from the Fujifilm web site.  The computer functions available on this camera are outstanding.  Great for simple point-an-shoot functions but even better for those who want much, much more out of your camera. Love it and would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: buy this camera!!!!
Reviews.Author: teen reviewer
Reviews.Content: wow i was amazed at this cameras nature shots!!! familly pics look like they come to life and the quality is stunning buy this!!!!

Reviews.Title: great but one little problem...
Reviews.Author: CarleenGeppi
Reviews.Content: My daughter bought this camera and received it on August 2nd 2013 she was so excited when she got it she opened it up turned it on a it said "No memory card put in a new memory card" or something like that she was still able to take pictures and see them for a couple of seconds but they wouldn't save cause there wasn't a memory card plus the directions were so confusing I couldn't even figure it out eventually my 11 year old daughter figured it out!The flash works great but you do have to spend some more money on a memory card i got a 16gb memory card for her birthday it was about $13-$14 it was affordable if you see them in walmart DON'T BUY IT they are very expensive it's ridiculous!I would have given this product 5 stars if it came with a memory card,Hope this helped!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: rachel
Reviews.Content: i love this  camera!! it is a great camera  and i couldnt have asked for better from his kind of camera. although it isnt the best camera i have ever seen it is still really great considering it is 150 dollars. i do recomend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: cmp
Reviews.Content: The camera has exceeded my expectations.  Very easy to work with.  Takes great pictures.  The zoom feature is very nice.  Excellent camera at a great price.  I love photography but have a tight budget.  The Fujifilm FinePix S4200 is perfect for the would-be Ansel Adams!

Reviews.Title: Really love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Prophecy Ladykins "turquoiseladykins"
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Fujifilm Camera. The first one I had was a FinePix S700 which I replaced with this one. The reason is the adapter part that's on the S700 Camera broke so I couldn't download the photos to my pc anymore, so I looked for another camera and found this one for a very good price. I can use the same adapter that I use to download the photos, but the plug into the wall adapter is going to be a little different due to the part that plugs into the camera is a different shape. I've always like to plug in my first camera when I also plugged in the other adapter to download photos to the pc to save some on the AA batteries. I use my camera mostly to take photos of costume jewelry but also of my adorable dachshund and my son's husky. This is a Very nice camera that takes beautiful photos. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: I Believe
Reviews.Content: We are not professional photographers by no means, but were tired of cameras that kept dying or worked inferior. This is great. The pictures are wonderful, and the record function on the camera takes movies that are longer that we expected. There is no delay when actually taking the pcture. Very user friendly, very great pictures. The price was right for us.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: RRobin
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera!!  I would absolutely recommend purchasing this camera.  Good price and great value for sure!  Buy this camera

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: David Perkins
Reviews.Content: Haven't had the equivalent of my old SLR in a while, but this camera brings back many of the features I love. Pictures are great, zoom is impressive, and for the price, you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Completely happy with my purchase!
Reviews.Author: Dustin Fabian Martinez Romo
Reviews.Content: Very good quality pictures for a very low cost. It completely fulfilled my expectations. I love my new bridge camera!

Reviews.Title: wow this is nice
Reviews.Author: Jerry H. Sherrow
Reviews.Content: I have another model of this one I got for our daughter.  When I checked it out I was ready to trade her.  So many improvements in just 2 yrs.  I especially like the panoramic shot. just click and move to line up the target and the camera takes the remaining shots auto.  SUPER

Reviews.Title: I wish I'd owned one sooner
Reviews.Author: Janie S Lyons
Reviews.Content: I have had the basic little rectangle point and shoot cameras in the past.  With the common, decent camera's on phones, that is what I've used for the last few years.  I still do use my camera phone in some situations, this camera is not so convenient.  However, the differences in the images is amazing, and well worth carrying the camera around for special events.As an upgrade from a rectangle point and shoot, this camera is wonderful, with a great price.  I particularly wanted the zoom, since my toddler stops being cute as soon as she sees the camera.  There are far more options that I understand to use, but the auto setting does an amazing job, and I like that I could learn to use the other settings.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera....Great Product.
Reviews.Author: Jorge Luis Rivero Perez
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, for the price it is impossible to beat. Great Pic. The zoom is the best!!!! 30x waaooo. Different setting option depending of the type of shot (night, sport, etc). I will recommend to buy a SD card type 10, you will need a fast speed card if you dont want to miss a pic.I usually take photo in the night and the flash is perfect, always take a good pic.I get this Cam to replace a Nikko Point and shoot digital cam 14.5 mega pixel.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm out of the box!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Puccini
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, the flash works, pictures inside aren't dark as some other reviews stated.  The only reason this didn't get a 5th star is it uses up the battery pretty quickly and when it does, the photos are "slow in processing.  I have missed a couple of shots due to the hesitation.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and great price"
Reviews.Author: jose aranguren
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic camera, the pictures and video quality is really good, so easy to use it.  More than I expected and great price.

Reviews.Title: Good all around camera
Reviews.Author: James Chumbley
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use, take video, panoramic, auto... Shots.  Only thing I would have done different on this purchase would be to get a bit more zoom.  But, I do like this

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: DianeB
Reviews.Content: This camera has a huge amount of special features.  I am only beginning to use them, but so far they are very helpful.  The 30x zoom is the best feature so far.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants more than a pocket point and shoot, but without the price of a professional style camera.

Reviews.Title: very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Roger Fetes
Reviews.Content: this is a very nice  camera with lots of functions, some of which i will probably never use.  i am really impressed with the panoramic pictures and the low light pictures.  better then any camera i have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Instruction booklet
Reviews.Author: Marina Tyson
Reviews.Content: I am happy with the camera with the exception of 1 glitch. All the instruction booklets were in the Dutch language.Printing instructions in English at the Fuiji website was a nightmare.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm S4200 Camera
Reviews.Author: USA
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It it as easy to use as any point and shoot, or as complicated as a novice like myself would care to get. It is quality plus - every adjustment is solid and well marked. The first two photos I took just to check it out were incredibly sharp. The 24X zoom works as well as binoculars - it brings things in close and remains clear and sharp. I wasn't expecting this kind of quality for under $150. I am very glad I chose this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Greg Sandoval
Reviews.Content: Nice pictures. Easy to use. The zoom is not the best after a certain point. But getting a camera at his price is worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kristi Raymond
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price...lots of features...very happy with this!  Picture quality is great..much better than my old Kodak camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: ParisLeOra
Reviews.Content: I am in art school. I just needed a basic camera that I could use for some of my projects. I say that its good for a beginner, I have a limited knowledge base and don't have many needs for it. It sucks that each video can only be 9 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: I really like this item. Just starting out but for the price its just what i needed. Only thing is getting the manual and you will need that.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the amateur photographer.
Reviews.Author: J. Santana
Reviews.Content: I bought a fuji finepix 12x s1500 several years ago, and it's still performing great.  I felt that I wanted a longer lens, so I decided to buy this camera. Wow!  I was surprised at this camera's performance. I have used this camera to shoot portraits and sports, and it has worked wonderfully.  Prior to buying this camera, I bought an entry-level DSLR, but found that for my needs this type of camera worked best (sold the DSLR on ebay).  You can use the manual settings, or the automatic settings and still get great pictures and video.  Additionally, the software on the camera is very easy to use compared to other cameras.  So if you are looking for DSLR features without the complexities, take a look at this camera.

Reviews.Title: great beginner camera
Reviews.Author: mrswagz
Reviews.Content: My hubby bought me this camera as a gift to help me kick off my photography business/hobby. This is a great camera to start learning how to use a DSLR. It still can be used like a basic point and click, but you can also change the settings and learn how to adjust the settings like on a professional camera. It takes wonderful pictures, very crisp. Love it.

Reviews.Title: A very fine point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: KsTinMan
Reviews.Content: I originally ordered a Canon SX30IS and then later purchased a Nikon L26, both of which I returned within days due to blurry photos. I almost expected the L26 at $107 to be marginally functional, but the SX30IS was more like $500 and I anticipated a good camera at that price. Wrong. I figured I was rolling the dice by ordering the S4500 at $160, but the reviews were reasonably good.Likes:The Fujifilm S4500 has a fairly good f-stop of 3.1 at minimum zoom, which produces great photos in low light situations. So far, nature photos are sharp and clear, even when the subject has a distant background. Portraits are particularly fine. The many functions are easy to understand and use. I've only spent a few minutes with the owners manual since most things are intuitive, assuming you've used a point and shoot before. The 30X optical zoom is great as long as there is plenty of light. You can't beat the price when it comes to this type of camera.Dislikes:I purchased a 16 GB Class 10 SDHC memory card for still shots and a 32 GB Class 10 SDHC for HD video. For some unknown reason, there are 9 minutes and 41 seconds available for HD video recording no matter which card is installed in the camera. One of the main reasons I purchased this model was to take an HD video of my daughter's wedding (or at least of their vows). I'm a bit disappointed with these results. A firmware update from Fujifilm was ineffective. I have a support ticket now to find out why this is happening. Hopefully I can determine how to double the video recording time before the wedding.Overall, I am very pleased with the camera. If I have to choose a lower video resolution for the wedding it certainly won't be a deal breaker. I'd recommend buying the S4500 to anyone as long as the HD video issue is resolved.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera at a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: M. Aleem
Reviews.Content: Works great! Great look and feel, along with picture quality. Nice and easy configuration options.... Date imprint feature is another thing that l Like and it has that. Zoom works great! The lens cover is detected by the camera and until it is taken off, camera does not take spaps.... no chance false Snaps - very intelligent.Only one problems is: Battery. Needs 4 AA batteries and goes for a month (with moderate usage).In one line: It was a great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Laura Neadle
Reviews.Content: This camera is less expensive than the digital I bought eight years ago, and the specs are way over the top for the price. I love Fuji products.

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: Andros
Reviews.Content: I find the camera amazing. I dont truly have any dislikes. If I had to choose one it would be that in the Optical zoom you have to be SUPER steady with your hand otherwise it jumps really bad. I find all the features are easily accessible. I have taken a few pictures now and I love them.I am use to the Push til it focuses then push further to take the picture so that part does not bother me.I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a great camera with a good bit of zoom.

Reviews.Title: This camera is great!!!
Reviews.Author: Tamara
Reviews.Content: This camera takes the best pictures and is easy to use. It focuses nicely the timer works great and to delete the pics is easy.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Federico d
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm S4500 Compact Digital Camera, is very good item. Thank you. Be detailed and specific. What would you have wanted to know before you purchased the product?

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Shakoora S.
Reviews.Content: got this about a month ago and love it great pictures im happy i chose this camera great prise too

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera does most everything well.
Reviews.Author: shaun mymudes
Reviews.Content: Buy it for great pictures and decent video.  Lithium batteries are a must have and don't be surprised if you find it fairly bulky.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love my Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Theresa L.
Reviews.Content: I am a newbie in photography and I have never been able to take great pictures even with a one shot disposable camera. I love the way the Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera allows me to shoot great photos. I was taking pictures of some doves mating the other day and was able to capture scenes without disturbing the natural environment. The camera is quiet when taking pictures and I absolutely love the zoom lens. I also captured some photo's of a baby deer which just made the camera that much more special to me. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants quality photo's. One of the things I would suggest is that you watch the video that one of the other raters compiled. I'm sorry that I don't remember his name but I am sure you can find it. He did an excellent job explaining the way the camera worked and I was able to just take the camera out and start shooting. Thanks Amazon for making all of my purchasing experiences the best!!

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: CB
Reviews.Content: Good camera, pictures are a good quality and there are several settings for the more experienced photographer. A good buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality For A Great Price
Reviews.Author: Kasey Lux
Reviews.Content: I can honestly say this is the best camera I have ever owned.  The quality is great.  It takes great pictures and video.  I love the zoom.  I also love that it takes AA batteries.  I'm no professional, but this camera is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for Still Shots
Reviews.Author: Sue Wojakowski
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the FujiFilm Finepix S4200.  It is great!  I love the SP feature which takes one picture with the flash and without the flash.  It leaves out the guess work.  I have only had it for a month but I am already happy with it!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: marcovd
Reviews.Content: A very good buy as expected came at the right time without any problem. com is such shows and I'm happy with the purchase. good camera

Reviews.Title: Its a good camera for the price i paid.
Reviews.Author: jasmine
Reviews.Content: the only thing i dislike about this camera is that when i take a picture it takes a while for me to take another one. And it is heavy i went to Nyc for the first time and had the strap around my neck and it made it so sore the next morning.

Reviews.Title: Great beginners camera!
Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: It is very easy to use! takes really good pictures once you learn the settings. not very heavy and easy to clean!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Ophelia Slocum
Reviews.Content: I love it! It is just what I wanted  and it takes great pictures. Still learning it  the more I use it the more I like.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Abigail
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera for beginners. It's easy and fun to use, and it takes good pictures. Eventually I'll upgrade to a DSLR, but for now this is perfect for making a transition. I take pictures at track meets and the shots are amazing!! I'm really happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Robert Stanker
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because of the many functions the camera can do and the quality of the pictures that it takesI like the fact that you can just pick it up and shoot your picture or set the settings that you want  and get good quality pictures either way .I would recomend it to people that are just beginning to take pictures  as it can auto focus  or let you pick your settings .

Reviews.Title: FUJI FINE PIX
Reviews.Author: roman dubecky
Reviews.Content: great camera, great service EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED,, PICTURES ARE PERFECT  AND THE FEATURES ARE MORE THAN ENOUGH, VERY HAPPY WITH IT

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Janet M. Larsen
Reviews.Content: It was what i wanted in a camera. I love it . i have alot of family and love taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Solid, simple useful
Reviews.Author: James A. Moshier
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for my wife as a transition for him from a point and shoot to a more fully functional camera.  It is working well, just enough extras for her hobby work, but not so complex that should could not start using it right away and be happy with it.  As she learns and develops her abilities as a photographer this camera seems to be helping her develop her eye and skills, all while having fun.  Glass good, lens is good and clear, buttons simple and functional, sturdy little camera.  Only drawback she has for it is the on-board flash has to be popped up by hand - non-auto that she has found as yet.

Reviews.Title: I love my camera
Reviews.Author: H. Elton Rouse
Reviews.Content: I now wish I h ad had enough money to buy a more well equiped fuji, but am happy with the camera as it is. Getting some great pix with it. Looking forward to spring to get out and about and try out the macro features. I am impressed with the panorama feature. This is my third Fuji camera moving up each time to a better model.

Reviews.Title: I can only say "WOW".....
Reviews.Author: Erika Lang
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, the prize is fantastic, the zoom is priceless - I love, I love it, I love it.....

Reviews.Title: Fuji finepix S4500
Reviews.Author: Victor V. Salvador
Reviews.Content: Very flexible programs,great buy for the money.Recommend this camera to any body who wants 30x or more zoom power, good battery life,good focusing system,(quick).Good ergonomics,hand grip etc.

Reviews.Title: Love My Camera
Reviews.Author: Sarah Hummelgard
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. It is very similar to the one I had before it that unfortunately had lens problems. This camera however so far is doing great! It is easy to learn to use, and takes amazing pictures!!

Reviews.Title: Only one word......WOW!
Reviews.Author: J. Bentley "Jarrod"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife for Valentines Day after reading some reviews and watching one Customer Vid on it and man oh man were they right.I have used some high dollar SLR's with different lenses and filters which are great, but for a beginner/intermediate user this camera has allthe convenient features of a point and shoot with the ability to pop it in manual and set it up the way you want. The zoom is incredible atthis price point. All in all one of the best cameras at this price I've ever used.

Reviews.Title: Perfect For My Needs
Reviews.Author: Kim Tokar
Reviews.Content: As a Realtor and depend on pictures as our main tool, I couldn't expect much more for the price. a

Reviews.Title: does a great job
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: Its a good camera if you are looking for one and don't want to spend copious amounts of money.  Does what you want, does it well.  A utilitarian art camera.  Worth a look!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera, fair price
Reviews.Author: Dr. S. Friedman
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for about $150.  It has a good camera, nice electronic viewfinder and a good LCD on the back for composing pictures.  I bought this for my wife who go tired of her old Polaroid point and shoot.  We aren't professional photographers or anything, and she wanted a camera that had better zoom.  This camera zooms in to 28x well, but it has trouble focusing and getting a clear picture at 30x.  Camera fits well in the hand, has a good pop up flash on top, controls are intuitive and easy to figure out.  Batteries last a while, better than the old Polaroid point and shoot digital camera she had.  I wish it came with a lens cap to prevent scratches.  It does come with a neck strap.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: James Dunlap
Reviews.Content: I love this camera it takes great photos and has lots of settings and with the 300X zoom you can take photos far away nice and clear . The macro mode is nice as well but the thing that made me happy with it and the main of why i got it is it takes great night photos. It also can take many photos as you sweep from side to side and then stitch them together in a panorama . I think that is a cool  feature to have in a camera in any case if you are looking for a well built camera with lots of pro type features check this one out i love it .

Reviews.Title: I love it this camera
Reviews.Author: jesus daniel blanco fernandez
Reviews.Content: This camera is good for a guy that want a ultra zoom camera but with a good price, the build quality is really awesome and the different shot modes allows take photos like a professional.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: wael elsedeki
Reviews.Content: I have a lot of cameras and this one was really good to learn with before spending a lot of money on DSLR cameras. i recommend it for beginners.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: zucanaima
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera, I am learning photography, I do not think becoming a professional photographer but is something I like to do, I like the size and anotomia of the camera, to others it is not heavy and is practical for travel

Reviews.Title: I Can't Believe It Was Less Than $200
Reviews.Author: Miriam N. Paschal "miriamp"
Reviews.Content: This camera works like one of those top of the line SLR cameras, except it's only got one lens.  It takes panorama and videos.  The picture is crystal clear.  Best of all, it takes good pictures in very low light without the flash, so the batteries last forever.  Yay.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Renae
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is easy to use and the photos looks fantastic. I have had many compliments on the pictures I took of our kids at our local nature park. The pictures turned out vivid and rich in color despite the dry winter landscape. The shutter speed works great when trying to capture a moving two year old, too, which is a plus. The video camera is easy to use as well. We filmed our daughter up on a stage at her school spelling bee and the video is clear and sharp. The only drawback was that the photos we took from far away did not turn out very well. They were fuzzy and it was difficult to make out our daughter's face. If you need a camera that can take photos farther than 24 feet, this is not the camera for you. However, the video turned out fantastic and we were able to make nice photos out of the video we had made. For the price, this camera is wonderful and we are quite happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Picture Fun
Reviews.Author: Andrea Rapson
Reviews.Content: This camera more than met my expectations.  I am finding it easy to use.  I am not a fancy picture person so I am using just the basics.  My children at school LOVE posing for pictures.

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: CHenderson2011
Reviews.Content: This camera I have had my own for at least 5-6 months. It's only good for still photography and not sports or any type of fast photography at all. zoom is pretty good. I would rather suggest someone save their money and buy a canon with a detatchable lens. Sure it costs more but better quality. But if you just do photography as a hobby, this camera is right for you.

Reviews.Title: amazing camera
Reviews.Author: reggie
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing, especially once the selling price, the zoom is huge, and excellent photo resolution! The best camera you can find in this price range.

Reviews.Title: Really love it...
Reviews.Author: Hubert F
Reviews.Content: Not much experience with photography ...but I love it this camera, it gives you the opportunity to start experimenting with different features and settings and learn more about photography but also allows you to use it just as a point-and-shoot with an awesome 30x zoom and superwide angle...that all comes in really handy. This camera really has gotten me started to experiment and to learn more about photography.The only thing that I wished was there, is a feature to manually work the focus as well, because sometimes the auto focus just doesn't do it they way I would like it....but hey, that's a new challenge to find ways to tweak it...learned already some about it.....oh, and the macro function is just incredible.....as well as ....ah so many things....lovin' it!  - In about 2 1/2 month time I have taken about 2,500 pictures...;-)

Reviews.Title: Very very good product :)
Reviews.Author: Zeta
Reviews.Content: One of my new passions is the photography and this is my first super compact camera. I'm very happy with my purchase, because this model has a lot of features and configurations that gives me the possibility of practice my techniques and concepts that I've learned in a recent course of photography.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera, great product!!!
Reviews.Author: luis espinel
Reviews.Content: excellent camera, great product, the resolution of this camera is great, is very functional and meets expectations, I recommend it 100% despite being semi professional gives the appearance of being more than that, I'm really enjoying

Reviews.Title: Quite a package!
Reviews.Author: tom thomson
Reviews.Content: This Fujifilm S4500 Compact Digital camera is quite exceptional....especially for the price.  It will take a while to learn to use all the cool features, but in the meantime, I can snap off high quality shots in "Auto" mode.  I hope it lasts a long long time, cuz I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Julieta
Reviews.Content: Great camera!!!. I was looking for a camera with a great price, a big zoom and working good in low light conditions. I have no regrets, it works perfect for me. I have no knowledge of fotography but this camera it's very easy to use and has a great automatic control that does the work for you.

Reviews.Title: Value value value
Reviews.Author: Murdog
Reviews.Content: Best bang for the buck. Software version 1.01 replaces version 1.0 and you can download it if you need it for free. Our camera was already updated. 30X Zoom is like having a 2 foot long lense on a SLR! No manual focus though. The best thing about this camera is when you select scenes they show you the same key photos that you saw in the manual.

Reviews.Title: Good price but you get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Vic
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera taking product pictures to be used on eBay. Its a good camera for the price. My only complaints about it is that the SD card slot is in the battery compartment underneath the camera and if you use a tripod you have to remove the tripod mount to get at the SD card. This was a really bad design decision on the part of Fuji. Second it doesn't have a port for an AC adapter, to use an ac Adapter it has to have a DC Coupler that installs into the battery compartment. I was hoping that the AC adapter from my older finepix camera was going to work with this one but unfortunately it didn't.Giving it 3 stars because of the location of the SD card slot. I would not have purchased it if I had know about that  ahead of time.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: VANESSA EKEKE
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a bridge camera to buy and practice shooting documentaries with before going for the Canon Mark 5D. I had a low budget of under $200 and after doing some research on the Fujifilm S4500 I decided to try Fujifilm even though Canon is my first choice. The results and videos have been amazing and I am utterly impressed with the quality of the videos and pictures even without any adjustments. As a budding documentary filmmaker this more than meets my needs for now before I am ready to upgrade to Canon 5D

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!!
Reviews.Author: Hard Metal "Hard metal"
Reviews.Content: Came right on time.  Works great as expected.  Would recommend to everyone for sure!!!  This is best purchase ever!  Great pic quality!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: avis hutchinson
Reviews.Content: I had been using a point and shoot (pocket-size) for a few years and decided I needed something with a better zoom for wildlife photos. Having a limited budget limited my choices severely, but was told that Fujifilm makes a good camera. The reviews were good for this particular model, so i purchased it. So far so good. I haven't learned all this camera will do yet (have had it less than a month). There are 2 cons that I have found so far. The first is it doesn't come with a rechargeable battery. Even though the 4 AA batteries last a fairly long time (long enough for several hundred photos), I probably will get weary of having to constantly buy batteries for it. Looking into rechargeable ones and hope that takes care of the problem. The 2nd con is the battery well is often hard to close. For some reason I have to try over and over until it finally clicks. I don't know if it's this particular camera that has the problem, or if they're all like that. It is not easy to close. Other that these two issues, I have had no problems (although I wish it had come with a cloth to clean the lens) and the camera takes great photos. Thanks, Fujifilm!

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Alexis J. Hutchinson
Reviews.Content: I've always loved fuji and this one has not let me down. The price is right too. I priced them all over the place. Free shipped is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeralynn
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas. It is wonderful-she loves it and uses it all of the time. There are many cool features to this camera. I would definitely order from this seller again

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: I got this for my mom, but I watched her start to use it and it seemed to work really well. I love the look of it and it seems pretty easy to figure out. I look forward to seeing the pictures she comes up with.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: I got this just before Christmas so I didn't have much time to play with it. So far though, I love it, took over 300 pictures with it on Christmas day. Batteries died after those 300+ pics tho.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: Bought for my wife for Christmas gift she had little trouble learning the finer points of using it great pictures ez to use

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: navypride
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife as a christmas present and she was instantly delighted. i can't get her to put it down. definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: A great buy
Reviews.Author: Helen K. Snowberger
Reviews.Content: I love this camera especially the Panorama capability and the instructions appearing on the screen. The 30x telephoto lens &anti shake system is great.

Reviews.Title: Unware
Reviews.Author: Bigdog
Reviews.Content: I was unaware that this camera used AA batteries rather than a battery pack.Camera is great, pictures are very good quality.Shame on me for not researching more into the item.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Mclovin
Reviews.Content: Great camera! Everything you could want in a zoom camera at an awesome price. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Percy
Reviews.Content: A very nice cross-over from my Minolta 35mm SLR camera which has to weigh 10 pound with the zoom lense. This Fujifilm camera is light weight and easy to handle with my somewhat arthritic hands. Love the zoom and the large viewing screen. Pictures are clear and brilliant with colors.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: John morgan
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the styling,design, and funtion of this camera. It is a quality camera at a budget price. The zoom is very powerful.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: David Simmons
Reviews.Content: This camera works perfectly. It takes great pictures without being an expert photographer. I would always look for this one again. I left one in Nigeria for my office over there. They don't know anything about cameras and look at the pictures on Face Book David Simmons Worldwide Ministry page.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm S4500
Reviews.Author: David W. Harper
Reviews.Content: The fujifilm is a nice camera, good weight, and handles well without difficulty. Albeit at times when  operating the shutter control, my finger slides to the zoom level, making one more aware of the position of each control. The rear viewer is clear and without complaint. The picture quality is good, not great but good. I had not had the chance to really use the zoom, to determine the quality of the images produced, at a later time. Overall its a good buy for the price and the quality of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera I ever owned
Reviews.Author: Bryant
Reviews.Content: I have a Bell and Howell which can produce fine developed pics the old school way, but this camera is simply the best I have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: ChanelEastCoast
Reviews.Content: So I bought this camera(not from amazon) but I buy stuff on here frequently so I figured i'd lay a review on here. I am just getting into photography, but it has always been an interest. I usually just get something new, review it, then come back to either add/remove starts and add to my original review.  I got this camera on Saturday as an early Christmas present from my roommate. I had been raving about wanting a Nikon, but since I'm new at this I thought a not so expensive starter camera would be just fine. As I get better I hope to upgrade to a nikon dslr.  To start it feels really good in your hands. Not cheap, but not too heavy. Easy to turn on and fast which is great for suddenly deciding to take a picture. It is not difficult to figure out how to use the wide variety of controls and photo variations. It comes with a strap and lens cap. The strap isn't the best, but it does its job. I carried it around with me on Saturday taking test shots of random things, the pictures came out really well considering it was raining. The person I'm dating right now is really into photography so with their help I will take some photos, post them, and add to this review as the week goes on. From what I can tell so far this is a great bridge camera for starters.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Nicolette Theodore-Moad "Lifelong Reader"
Reviews.Content: I opened it up to check it for my daughter.  I didn't peruse everything but it takes great pics and very sturdy camera!  It came with a memory card- bonus! and love the case.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Kim Griffith
Reviews.Content: While you can make most settings manually, I usually get better pics using the automatic settings. Has more features than I'll ever need. Doesn't come with a memory card.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Happy Camper
Reviews.Content: This is my second Fujifilm Finepix.  My first one had a very rough life as I take it on long hikes and more than once it ended up being banged against a rock or tree, but it gave me plenty of satisfactions and gorgeous pictures.With the 30X zoom I plan to get even closer to the wildlife I love to observe and photograph.

Reviews.Title: I like it however
Reviews.Author: C. Hewitt
Reviews.Content: It can get some really nice shots however i cant get clear shots constantly.  My old kodak i could but it was showing age.  So, i may get this camera down to get good pics everytime but havent got it yet.

Reviews.Title: Takes great distance shots!
Reviews.Author: Diana McCracken
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for zooming in on subjects and getting great close-ups!  It is best for "still" objects, taking quite a long time between depressing the shutter button and the camera actually taking the photo.  Haven't used it yet for shots of grandkids but I expect that between depressing the shutter button and actually getting the photo, the kid will be long gone.

Reviews.Title: It Is A great Startoff.
Reviews.Author: joe9624 "Giuseppe Barletta"
Reviews.Content: The FujiFilm FinePix S4500 is a great bridge for its price. It is a 14MP Bridge with a 24mm lens and a 30x zoom. It offers amazing zoom and stability when taking a photo from zoom. It does not do to good on recording videos as you can see in my Assassin's Creed 3 Limited Edition Unboxing Video. It also does not do so good in low light as I always find the photos come out grainy and when I do turn on the flash It is too bright. The continuous setting works for the first 5 photos but then comes out into one big blur. The macro settings are pretty good and I like the results. As for the physical body of the camera I love the comfortableness of the camera and its nice professional look. It seems like I am holding a DSLR! The camera includes a mini HDMI port to show the photos you took on your tv and a av port. Also the camera has easy share settings to Youtube and Facebook which is another great add-on. In conclusion this camera is great for start off photographers that want to take photos of nothing too serious.Score: 3/5

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm S4500 Camera
Reviews.Author: ebird
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice camera for the price.  The modes for sports are not as good as I was hoping for. A tripod helps but still pretty blurry. The other modes are good and learning more everytime I use it.  Just remember trial and error is the best method.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and great value
Reviews.Author: Mattyfatz
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my broken Canon S5 for less than the cost of repairing the Canon. The S4500 is very simple to operate. Its large lens gathers plenty of light, and the zoom is amazing. I appreciate how fast the picture is captured when the shutter is pressed.. its like an SLR in that respect. This camera  is much simpler to use than the Canon, but it does lack some of the "pro" features you get with a Canon (like a hot-shoe, articulating LCD screen).So far I've been impressed with the color and contrast of my photo's. The Fujifilm S4500 is a great camera and a great value.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Juegos86
Reviews.Content: I've tried this camera and is excellent for an average person who is looking a nice but cheap camera. I'm not professional on photography but thanks to this S4200 I'm starting to like it a lot and my girlfriend who knows about cameras says it very nice camera even for her who has a t4i. I'm very happy with it... so far already has a month and I havent had any issues. Any way if your are thinking for a normal $100 -$230 camera, this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Fugifilm S4500
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Have not had time to really play with my new camera but the few shots I have taken are great. This camera is much easier to use than my last ,more expensive camera. I sold my Nikon D3100 and purchased this Fujifilm cam. The cost for all of the features and crisp ,clean photos is great for the money spent. I would and do tell my family and friends about this camera.I highly recommend this unit and my experience with Amazon.com was and always has been excellant. i use Amazon for many purchases due to ease of use and due to the fact we live in a small rural community. Nearest shopping area is 60 miles away.Fujifilm S4500 Compact Digital Camera

Reviews.Title: good and versitle
Reviews.Author: Terry Moore
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the camera.  I have been surprised by the battery life.  Haven't tried all the features yet but the common ones are very easy to use.  A little disappointed that it doesn't have as many photo format selections as my pocket camera does, seems like that would be an easy thing to install.  Color is good, zoom is good.  Haven't had any issue with the sound of the motor in video.  Low light is better than expected.  A good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: James Martin
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to operate and is without a doubt a most pleasant surprise . The camera takes terrific photos. I'm very pleased with my purchase and would reccommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great name for a great camera
Reviews.Author: Simple Shopper
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as a gift and given to someone who loves to take pictures.It is a perfect fit for them. It allows them to take the type of pictures they like and gives them great results. The lens size gives them better clarity and more options for their photos. The detail is over the top and still continues to surprise. I think this gift to person match may be my best ever.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm S4500
Reviews.Author: RonS
Reviews.Content: Had a little problem with it at first.No problem they sent me a new camera so far I love It.

Reviews.Title: Not working, returned.
Reviews.Author: pwilliams
Reviews.Content: Sorry Fujifilm...I really wanted this to work out and hate leaving a very bad review...The zoom would not work half of the time.  And the date stamp would not set properly.In addition to it not working, here is my take on this camera if it had worked properly.  I probably would have returned it anyway.  It feels cheap (it feels like one of those old film cameras that are lightweight and plastic...and I understand they are trying to make it lightweight and all, but really?) and is poorly designed.  The compartment that you put your memory card in is also where the batteries are housed.  So every time you open the compartment to put in or take out the memory card, the batteries fall out.  And, it is not a one handed operation; the compartment is not easy to open; you have to use your fingernail to open it which results in a broken nail.  I am sure the engineers that designed this camera are not photographers; and maybe have never used a camera before.  It is as if they tried to save space by putting the memory card with the batteries, and then said "oh, poo! since the door is going to be opened a lot for the memory card, we should make the latch extra sturdy there!" ... which results in it being very difficult to open.  Now, this might be fine for someone who puts a card in, goes on vacation, and takes hundreds of photos before taking out the card.  But, if you are like me and need to take only a few or several at a time and take out the card to view it in Photoshop, you are going to be highly frustrated.Also, I think the problem with the time/date stamp may be because whenever you take out the card, and the batteries fall out, the camera prompts you to put in the date again when you turn the camera on...every time...which is annoying....but it would not let me put in the month and date, just the year, and then the month and day showed 0.The problem I had with the zoom, was it would not move at all when I was trying to focus for a shot...so I would look at the camera and try to figure out if I was on the right button (which I knew I was) and then it would just randomly start zooming.  And then get stuck there, and not "un" zoom.  And then I would MISS the shot :/I sent it back and got a Canon EOS Rebel T3I.  Which is more expensive....but it works....and will work for a long time which will avoid having to spend more money in the very near future for a new camera.  Which definitely was defeating the purpose of trying to find a moderately priced great camera....which this is NOT a great camera...IF it worked it might have been a good camera at best.The problem with color...yes I read the other wonderful review about color balance and inside colors looking yellow, etc...and yes it does....and it looks very grainy....I get better photos on my old IPAD!  Seriously!  You can adjust the color balance, but it is just so off the begin with!  I understand photography a little and thought I could handle it, but it is a pain!  On the plus side, if you are only going to take photos outside they are pretty good...unless you are trying to zoom...and the zoom does not work...like mine.So, if you are looking for something "up" a level from a point and shoot, kinda like a really good camera but with training wheels, if you want to try this one, go ahead, Amazon has a great return policy...but in my opinion....Save your money.  Save up for something a little bit better that has had good reviews for a long time.For the good part of this review.  Amazon was incredibly wonderful with the return.  I went to my account, clicked on return, told them why (without all of this detail, just the zoom was not working and the date stamp was not working), they emailed me a return slip to put in the box, and scheduled UPS to come to my door to pick it up.  I did not even have to put a label on the box, UPS had the label when they got here.  It did not cost me anything or anytime really to return it.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable deal for this high quality camera Fujifilm S4200
Reviews.Author: Vas Polavarapu
Reviews.Content: This camera is 14 Megapixels with an awesome lens for only $140Add a class 10 32GB SD card and it is also a video camcorder. Be careful  opening and closing the battery door, I expect that the plastic latch will break in the long term.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: ronnie moncrief
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the money! Point of fact for all the people complaining about grainy photos etc. this is a common occurrence for any camera if you take pictures in low light situations. This one actually takes very good pictures in low light settings if you are at all familiar with camera settings and how to adjust them properly. I took several pictures the first night this camera arrived in a darkened living room with the only light source being a 47" television and the cameras flash. Good results. Do not hesitate to buy this camera if you are put off by other reviews! BUY BUY BUY!!!

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm S4500
Reviews.Author: james Klus
Reviews.Content: Camera itself is fine and takes pictures according to my expectatations.  However i was disappointed by the following shortcomings:1) No owner's manual included (this is a normally supplied for all all technical purchases).  There is no statement in the desription of product that an owner's manual will not be supplied.2) The is no statement in the description pf the product that the software supplied on the CD to transfer pictures to a computer is only compatible with Windows operating systems Windows 7 (SP1) and Windows Vista (SP2) and later versions. Since I have Windows XP, I cannot transfer pictures to my computer and I must buy a memory card reader.3) Most importantly, the product desription does not state that a memory card is not included and must be purchased separately.Taken together, the acquisition of these items cost me an additional $36 and 3 hours of time.  I STRONGLY RECOMMEND YOU ALERT BUYERS THAT THESE ITEMS WILL HAVE TO BE PURCHASED SEPARETLY AND ARE NOT INCLUDED!!

Reviews.Title: What can i say
Reviews.Author: Fujifilm2012
Reviews.Content: you get what you paid for, thats for sure. It has pretty good resalution for only being a bit over $200. Its a good camera. I reccomend this to anyone that is a beginner and is on a low budget. Its money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Flash  never worked!
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: Broken flash unit,bought from HSN.will give it a second chance.great pictures( obviously none that need a flash,) on off button tends to stick and logo wearing out ,only had it for less than a month,would have sent it back straight away but needed it for  a wedding and vacation. Looks like several people have had same issue with the flash unit.I don't think this camera will last a long time.if you can afford a better camera then don't buy this one.Batteries do not last more than a couple of days,I would say about 12 to 20 photos then have to put new ones in.

Reviews.Title: Broken Flash
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera once you figure it out. Mine, right out of the box, had a broken flash. Without the flash some settings will not work. Zoom is Great and picture quality as well. Over all for the price it is a great camera, if it works properly. Unfortunately I will have to return mine. Update: I have decided to get the Kodak z990 if you wish to do a comparison for high quality low cost camera.

Reviews.Title: Blurry Photos, Not Sharp, even in good light.
Reviews.Author: EH
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera because it had so many 5 star reviews on Amazon.  After spending some time taking photos, I began to wonder.  I now see that many of the reviews listed for this camera are actually for different models.I purchased the Fujifilm S4500 with 30x zoom as an impulse buy during a sale.  I am replacing a 3 year old Panasonic Lumix travel zoom (12x) which no longer takes sharp pictures due to dust sucked into the lens.I primarily take photos of my cats (indoors) and outdoor scenery and animals (mountains, ocean, birds).  I need a camera that works indoors and outdoors.  I want a camera with good automatic settings that I don't have to adjust.  The AA batteries and option to use a view finder appealed to me since I like to take photos on long camping trips where I don't have access to electricity.My first thought taking the camera out of the box was 'This is cheaply made.'  On the upside, the camera does feel good in my hands.  I like the sticky, rubbery gripping surface covering most of the camera.  It makes it much easier to hold.The battery/SD compartment door is difficult to open, however.  It also looks like something which will break within a year or so given the flimsy looking hinges and the force needed to open it.I find the lens cover aggravating.  You have to pinch the edges, set it just so inside the lens, and let go.  If you have it in the right spot, it will snap to the inner edge of the lens and stay in place.  For some reason, I'm having a very hard time setting this right.  I would prefer a cover built into the camera that automatically opens or closes-- or a cover that twists or snaps on top of the lens, rather than inside it.My iPad takes sharper photos than this camera does.  With my iPad or Panasonic, I can see individual hairs and whiskers in my cat photos.  Even when the picture is not blurry, it has very little detail.  Even though this is a 14 MP camera, the pictures look as if they are designed for low-resolution web display.  The camera comes with two automatic settings.  I've tried both, and neither improve the sharpness of the photo.Another big problem is that the camera does not seem to focus well.  When taking photos of a picture on a wall or a vase with flowers, with no zoom, the image is blurred 60% of the time.  When using the zoom, the blurring is even worse.I tried taking some photos outdoors this morning in sunlight and still found that the camera did not focus well, even when taking a still life. Forget trying to take a clear photo of something that moves or breathes.I do not think this camera is worth even the very low sale price I paid for it.  I plan on returning it.

Reviews.Title: Not good indoors and poor focus!!
Reviews.Author: Jesse L. Darnell
Reviews.Content: Takes great pics outside in sunlight, but poor indoors and at night! Focus in general is just bad...lots of blurry pics...not horrible, but not sharp images, which I feel is a must-have for any camera over $100! If your main use will be indoors of people, this camera is not a good choice!

Reviews.Title: Fuji S4500 camera
Reviews.Author: Catherine F. Jackson
Reviews.Content: Hi! I bought a FUJI Fine pix S4500 for my husbands birthday, here are his words;I love my pocket digitals, but because I have a Mamiya large format and a Minolta SLR 35 mm I have a hard time reconciling their limited use. Don’t get me wrong, I used the hell out of the 3 or 4 I had, but I just took snap shots with them. You can’t compose or take “photographs” with those minis. The Fuiji Fine Pix S4500 is a remarkable entry-level camera at about $150.It gives features like manual aperture and speed which in my humble opinion is more than necessary for composing photographs. One of the other outstanding feature is the way Fuji handles the “Macro” feature. (I take a lot of close ups of flowers, ants, bugs and anything that scurries along the ground). And I like that it uses batteries instead of a charging system.I’ve had my S4500 for about 3 weeks now and keep discovering new features that just astound me. The only thing it lacks is changeable lens, but that feature does not appear on anyone’s unit till you spend a lot more money.The only suggestion I can make is down-load and print the owners manual. Its quite large and really cumbersome on screen. (take your pages to any print shop and have them stapled or bound, it’s not expensive).Go to  fuji.com  and watch their presentation on this camera.  Paul

Reviews.Title: It's a nice camera
Reviews.Author: adrian
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas 2012 because in spring break 2013 I went on a school trip to France and Amsterdam. I used this camera all throughout the trip. It worked very well. Except at night. While I was on a night cruise trying to take pictures of the Seine River and the Eiffel Tower I had to use my phone. The night function was kind of slow but everything else was great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera for it's price
Reviews.Author: Rinna
Reviews.Content: It's a good camera for basic needs and starters. :D Not good at all for night shots. Camera requires good lighting to work properly.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have no had any of the problems that the nay sayers had experienced. I have even tried to reproduce the issues myself, and have descovered that most of the time it is a settings issue. One should not buy this class of camera and expect it to function like a $1000 camera. It is a step up from a point and shoot camera and a big step up!

Reviews.Title: So Happy to Have a View Finder Again!
Reviews.Author: Sandra L. Ortiz
Reviews.Content: Admittedly, I am having a little bit of trouble adjusting to the inconveniences involved in dragging around a big camera again, but console myself that since I always have an iPhone handy in my purse that takes decent enough pictures for those unexpected Kodak moments, I can reserve this one for travel and special occasions.  While most lay people consider this camera "outstanding," professional photographers have not been so kind, saying it's just so-so as digital cameras go, and I have to agree the pictures aren't really better than what I (occasionally) got with my older Panasonic Lumix. There's a learning curve involved here and I still haven't quite mastered it. The camera seems a little slow to respond, and doesn't like being rushed. That being said, this is what I really like about the Fuji S4500 and why I'm happy with it:  1) It has both a viewing screen and a view finder. Lord, I missed having a view finder, especially for outdoors on a sunny day, but also when I'm trying to frame a telephoto shot.  I like being able to steady the camera against my forehead; 2) It feels good and substantial without being very heavy; 3) You will not accidentally take flash pictures while in a museum rousing the anger of the security guards since the flash has to be raised before it will work. That feature alone is worth the price of admission!!; 4) While not the easiest of cameras to use, the controls are a lot more intuitive than on my other camera, where I was always forgetting how to proceed; and 5) Once you get it right, it takes some awesome shots. If I had the $$ for a digital SLR, I'd go for it, but otherwise this is a decent alternative for the $150 or so price tag. (Just remember, it's NOT an SLR--though it looks like one--so don't take too tight a shot or you'll lop something off)

Reviews.Title: Fuzzy wuzzy pictures
Reviews.Author: Shermie of the Rockies
Reviews.Content: I am an experienced photographer who has won awards for my macro photos of flowers and insects.I purchased this camera based upon the reviews here, especially with the review about photographing wildlife with the zoom lens.  It did okay pictures for bird shots, but my beloved flower pictures left so much to be desired.  Recently I took 100 pictures of a beautiful yellow flower in later afternoon sun. None of the pictures were in focus at all.  I used the marco settings and other settings to learn the camera.  I've been using the camera to take lots of spring pictures and my disappointment in the majority (about 95% of the pictures) makes me rate this camera 1 star of out 5.  Even trying to take pictures of a recent full moon failed miserably.I mainly purchased this camera for it's viewfinder, an aid to a glasses-wearing person like myself.  The viewfinder makes all the pictures look clear, evening zooming in makes the pictures look focused until you get them on the computer.  By the time you want to cry at all the lost opportunities of great shots, I plan on ridding myself of this camera as soon as possible.I'm going back to my 2005 Kodak and it's better settings and qualities of pictures.  My only complaint about that Kodak Easy Share, its small pixel size (great for when the camera came out) and its eating up of AA batteries.  This fujifilm camera is my second and I'll gladly use the older point and shoot to win 2nd best of show again with it.  With this camera, I'd be laughed out of any photography contest I'd enter.

Reviews.Title: Takes very good pictures!
Reviews.Author: skeptic "bruce"
Reviews.Content: I like the zoom, took a picture of a neighbors car license plate numbers from 250 ft away could read it clearly, you have to make sure the digital zoom is turned on. This camera has two auto picture settings, I use both , I took a close up of a electronics board with auto setting but, it showed clearer on the SRAuto mode, I think in this last operation mode the camera switch's to Macro automatically. Normally I just use Auto mode. I am just a casual picture taker, had a Kodak Digital camera before that stopped working after it slipped from my hand, I did catch the camera before it hit the ground but then it would not take pictures, it also was a smaller type and I had a hard time taking pictures in bright sunlight through the display. This camera you just change to the top viewfinder solves that problem. No negatives with this camera, I have had it for a couple months. When you hold it in your hand it has a rubber type feel no slippery.

Reviews.Title: No Diopter Adjustment For EVF
Reviews.Author: Richard Brown "Richard"
Reviews.Content: I own a Fujifilm S7000 camera, love it, and was looking to upgrade.I wear glasses and use the Electronic View Finder (EVF) almost exclusively for framing my shots.  Unlike my S7000, the S4500 does not have a diopter adjustment for the EVF making for a fuzzy view through the EVF and the camera unsuitable for my use.I should have researched my purchase more thoroughly.  Know before you buy.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: T Ford
Reviews.Content: This camera is wonderful. It takes really sharp, clear pics. I bought the camera to take on my vacation to the NASCAR races at Talladega. I set the camera to "action" and was just able to point and shoot and it took excellent pictures. I would definitely recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera, did not meet expectations
Reviews.Author: George Jones
Reviews.Content: Purchased the camera because of the long zoom, electronic viewfinder and many other features that came with it.  The camera did not dissappoint.  The camera is loaded with many feaures that  more expensive cameras do not have.  Unfortunately, I felt like the picture quality was not any better than my 10 year old Nikon which had half the megapixels.  Pictures taken in low light were grainy likewise with the video.  I tried the camera for several days taking pictures with my old camera, then taking the same shot with this new camera and found that the old camera took as good or better pictures.  So I made the decision to the return the camera.  Amazon was great about returning it.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Mare
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice camera.  Has a lot of different options.  If you are into or getting into photography and want a good camera with powerful zoom that you can do a lot with but aren't a serious photographer, this is the perfect camera.  In fact, I've had it for a while now and I'm still learning new things about it.  It does take some very nice pictures.  And, it has a great zoom feature.  Although, as with any zoom when you zoom in so far the camera needs to be really steady.  So I suggest if you're planning on using the zoom a good bit, invest in a tripod because the camera needs to be super steady when taking pictures when zooming in. Or the picture will come out blurry.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the noob.
Reviews.Author: Michael Soe
Reviews.Content: I am a complete newbie to photography, and using this camera in the auto mode makes my picture look like if I were a pro.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mandie Lancaster
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. I have now purchased this one twice. One for personal use and one for office use. Love!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: B. Hickey
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for special occasions but I find I'm using it all the time. Prior to this I kept using the little pocket cameras, some of which have a lot of features but I wanted something I could tuck away. Once I started using this camera though, I found I didn't mind toting it around. Lots of features but easy to learn. One of the main features for me is the zoom. I've gotten some fantastic pictures because people didn't know I was there and didn't 'pose'. I'm able to get more natural shots. And the low light sensitivity is great. I've been able to get pictures where flashes weren't allowed. I am so glad I got this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, but...
Reviews.Author: bam
Reviews.Content: Would give it five stars, but having a hard time figuring out the flash.  Everything else is working great.  Takes great photos despite distance.  Glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Karen F. Simmons
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a Christmas gift for my 14 year old daughter.  It is easy to use and takes great pictures.  It is light weight and compact.

Reviews.Title: Great pics!
Reviews.Author: Tanya Roberts
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pics! Got it for my husband for christmas. Only problem is the batteries die after a couple pictures. I recommend this camera except for the battery issue. I would like to know if we are supposed to use a different type of battery?

Reviews.Title: Great camera for photography enthusiasts
Reviews.Author: Kristi
Reviews.Content: Just right for people who like photography more than amateurs but less than professionals.Pros:Value & priceMode wheel is not too crowded or too sparse (2 spots for scene priority and 1 spot for custom settings)Panorama is very smart and connects cleanlyGrip is goodFast autofocus and turn-onCons:Size, comparatively to similar models by Canon and NikonSeems to have an insensitive sensor (average exposure is low - I always bracket up by 1/3)No manual focus

Reviews.Title: Dont Buy This Camera !!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: RET
Reviews.Content: Takes Horrible grainy pictures with flash without flash.  Action photos stink.  I had to return it after a few days.  Don't waste your time or money

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool
Reviews.Author: E
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my sister. She loves it but the the 4 batteries that yo u have to put in the camera does not last a long time. The pictures come out great. Oh and she loves the features that it has.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline sprague
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my daughter. She advises it is fun to use, takes sharp pictures and is easy to operate. She especially likes the zoom feature and the ability to share pics from the camera to FB.

Reviews.Title: Love my this camera because it is so easy to use!!
Reviews.Author: J. Stroh
Reviews.Content: I just can't say enough good things about the Fujifilm FinePix camera.  I love it!  It is so very easy to use and you get a great picture every single time!  The camera is small and compact and not at all heavy to carry with you.  It fits easily into a backpack or purse without a lot of extra added weight.  It fits nicely into your hands and the features are easy to reach with your fingers.  The zoom is fantastic and there isn't a lot of hassle to get the right size that you want for your photo.  Just point and shoot and you have great shots of what you are shooting.There are many features on this camera and I suggest reading the book let through and through to make sure you know what available features that are on this camera as there are sooooo many and all so easy to use.  The camera is not complicated at all to use.  If you need a good camera that you can point and shoot and get great shots then this camera is for you.  I couldn't be happier with this camera!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: bcso59
Reviews.Content: I have purchased many point and shoot cameras in the past and have had very bad luck with them.  I read many reviews for this camera before purchasing and decided for the price (a little more than a normal point and shoot) I would give it a try.  I have taken app 300 pictures from low light to sunny conditions and have found the camera to work very well.  I am not an experienced photographer but the picture quality is great.  The camera itself is easy to use and the features are very easy to figure out.  I cannot say I have found one thing I do not like about this camera. If your looking for a modest priced camera that takes great picures this camera is it !!

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix digital camera
Reviews.Author: Donald Maurer "Don Maurer, Sgt., USMC"
Reviews.Content: This is the finest camera I have had since the invention of the 35mm.  I had shot wedding photos for years and got used to manual settings.  I still use them on this fine camera.

Reviews.Title: short films
Reviews.Author: Mark L. Russell "Mark L. Russell"
Reviews.Content: I make short films for a living, this is a very good camera but the audio isn't perfect I would buy a microphone with it fellow consumers.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: china doll
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased this this purchase.  This was what I have been looking for the the right price.  the digital quality if great.

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: Rose  Gribble
Reviews.Content: to many button to figure out and it's not very good for a person who is jsut starting out ...but very lite and take good picture if and when you figure out all the buttons

Reviews.Title: good for family pics
Reviews.Author: Shadrack Mensah
Reviews.Content: Yes I love it, pic quality is great  and best easy to use. I will recommend it to anyone who want it for family use

Reviews.Title: PERFECT FOR THE AMATURE
Reviews.Author: Lynn Urlaub
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect camera for someone who wants to take digital pictures with something better than their phone.  My boyfriend is disabled & can only use one hand.  Well, THIS puppy works perfectly for him too.  It's not too heavy or complicated and it takes excellent pictures.  Flash on/off is easy too.  I absolutely have no complaints about this product and I was a photographer for more than a few years.

Reviews.Title: Good Zoom
Reviews.Author: Brian Buntine
Reviews.Content: Has a very good zoom but don't expect sharp photos. Quality is an issue. I would probably spend a little more and get a Canon next time. I bought for the zoom and reasonable price. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: Thad
Reviews.Content: This camera is the best, we have taken it on many excursions and have loved every second with it, great price, little heavy but worth every penny

Reviews.Title: With this camera I do not need my camera and video cam.
