Reviews.Content: Camera works just fine. It takes great pictures and is easy to understand all of its many functions. It will not however clean your room and take out the trash.Would have been nice if a case was included. Mine came with a lens cap ; neck strap; 4 batteries; instruction booklet- and it was packaged well.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S4200
Reviews.Author: CHRISTY EBERLEIN
Reviews.Content: Omg, This is an amazing Camera for any price but especially the price I paid for it.  Awesome Job!  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Works really well
Reviews.Author: C. Altis "Cyrix"
Reviews.Content: The camera really met all my expectations.  I am still learning the intricacies, but I love it.  Takes really good photos.  For the price, I don't think I could have done better

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! The panorama feature is awesome, I love using it. The flash works great, I use it for most of my photos. The camera took a while to get to the door, but it was worth the wait. It isn't great at focusing and usually has grainy pictures without a flash.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Tracey Birch
Reviews.Content: Love it! Having a tough time with the focusing hang zooming. Ridiculous price! Very happy.So far my piece are beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Fuji Camera
Reviews.Author: redheadneohio
Reviews.Content: I got this camera before Thanksgiving, I'm still learning to use but the picture I got were great.Can't wait to learn all the apps on this camera. Thank you Amazon for suggesting this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good but falls short in some ways
Reviews.Author: James Ownby
Reviews.Content: This camera takes amazing pictures. It has an amazing zoom that will knock your socks off. But there's also some not so amazing things about it. For one, it requires you to fully power up the camera, including removing the lens cap, when you hook it up to your computer to transfer files. So instead of an actual USB mode, which EVERY camera I've previously owned has had, this one requires you to fully power it up, remove the lens cap, potentially get it dirty while the display runs at full bright white. Annoying as heck and ultimately is potentially damaging. The other thing is the macro mode. Do NOT buy this camera if taking close-ups is a major thing for you. It just really sucks at that. The auto-focus is so completely non-functional in macro mode that the mode might as well not exist.NOW, having said all that, if you want a camera with a really good zoom that takes good pictures of people and the countryside, this does that very well. Just be prepared to use up a lot of your battery transferring files, and don't ask it to take close-ups.

Reviews.Title: Don't bother
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I ended up sending this back the same day I got it. I tested the camera out for a few hours under conditions similar to what I inteded to use it for; which was low lighting from a distance. I had done research and this had specs  and reviews that sounded perfect for me. Unfortunately after getting the camera and becoming increasingly frustrated at the grainy or blurred quality of it's automatic settings, I turned to the internet and tried manually setting it based on what was recommended by other users. Still I had no luck, In a final test I set the camera on the floor, laid down, and tried to take a distance shot. It came out the same blurred, grainy, picture as what I'd been getting all afternoon. Back to Amazon it went.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: eonicholson
Reviews.Content: Perfect size, abundant features, easy to use.  What more could you ask for in a compact camera.I reccomend this camera for anyone looking for a point and shoot with more capability and control than the pocket point and shoot category.

Reviews.Title: Serious photographer on a budget --- Dissappointed
Reviews.Author: Richard Sonnenfeld
Reviews.Content: I am not a professional photographer, but I understand photography, and I regularly trade off shutter-speed, F-stop and CCD "speed" to get the shot I want.  Think of this camera as a point-and-shoot with better optics. It does have optical zoom, which is a good thing, but the CCD is clearly pretty small (not sure how small, but surely nothing close to a 35 mm frame).  Of course, the cameras that DO have large CCDs are $1000 or more.  So my disappointment is that this LOOKS like a real camera, but it isn't.Anyone who has studied the Megapixel wars knows that it's an invalid spec.  This camera may have 14 Mpixels, but I'd say the image quality is worse than the last Canon camera I had (which sadly broke) that had only 6 Mpixels.  It's really overall a bad thing.  A camera with 14 MPixels takes giant images (file size is giant) but the quality is not there.  So essentially you are wasting hard-drive space or clogging up your e-mail with files that are probably 5 times larger than they should be becauseof the empty magnification.  This camera is loadedwith features to try to get the best shot if you don't know anything about photography, but if you DO know something,it's frustrating.  I tried to use aperture priority mode, which should allow you to set the aperture and have the camerachoose the shutter speed to get the shot.  This is useful when you want to control depth of field.  On this camera, aperturepriority only allows F3.5 (wide open) and F8.  I was disappointed that you could not have anything in between.  I think it'sbecause it's really not for serious photographers.  So ... if you are one ... save your money till you can getsomething that you will like.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm S4500 Compact Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Leonard
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a gift for our son and he simply loves the features that the Camera provides.  Easy to set-up and easy to use.Quality of pictures and the many various camera settings allow for taking pictures in an array of circumstances, i.e., low light, fire works, action pictures, panorama, video, etc.  Good value for the $$$ paid.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: George Thompson
Reviews.Content: More than satisfies the needs of the lab.  Easy to use and learn.  The computer cable is compatable with the smaller Fujifilm camera that we have

Reviews.Title: Do not waste the money
Reviews.Author: Grace Petrarca
Reviews.Content: This camera is terrible!  Pictures are blurry, and action shots are impossible.  I only wish I could return it...however the return policy does not allow....bummer

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Darlene Faulkner
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera, easy to learn......the only thing I DON'T like about it is the photo card is in the same spot as the batteries.  I have dumped the batteries twice because of that.

Reviews.Title: FinePix  S4200
Reviews.Author: Vicki Ray
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, lots of picture taking options. To bad the owners manual tells you nothing about the features or how the camera operates. If you have been schooled in photography or you don't mind searching the internet for tips, it a good camera. Otherwise just put it in manual and live with it. Oh, the price is reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Royce A.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on a cross country trip, and was amazed at the pictures i was able to take with it.  It is absolutely unbelievable that a camera without a huge price tag can take such beautiful pictures. Would reccomend this camera to anyone.  It is also very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Amy E
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera about 6 months ago. The zoom is awful. Very grainy. You can't take a picture with the zoom, far away. Meaning if your subject is far away The dial mode sticks. Sometimes the lens sticks also. Pictures in bright light don't come out correctly.Sunrises the pictures are yellow. Not to say I haven't taken some nice pictures.But I do have a lot of lousy ones also. I have a point and shoot Canon takes better pictures. I will say the battery life is good. Very disappointed. Will never buy another Fuji.

Reviews.Title: FUJIFILM 4500
Reviews.Author: LYNN PERRY
Reviews.Content: PURCHASED THIS CAMERA FOR THE LONG BUILT IN ZOOM LENS.USING IT PRIMARILY FOR OUTDOOR PHOTOSWORKING VERY WELL FOR MY USES.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Ron Lewis
Reviews.Content: If you don't want to spend a lot of money on a camera and still want  a good camera , this one has a great zoom lens and really takes good pictures. We purchased this camera right before our vacation this summer to the East Coast I took a lot of pictures and they all came out great .

Reviews.Title: Husband's B-day Present
Reviews.Author: E. Cullum "buyer"
Reviews.Content: My huusband is very happy with this camera .  He has a problem with his eyes and needs a view finder to see what he wants to shoot.  This camera fills the bill.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: jaquelyn arvidson
Reviews.Content: i filmed by boyfriend at his bodybuilding competition and the pics came out very nice, being that he was moving for his poses and the lighting is bright on the stage and i have no clue how to function a camera. but the instructions were pretty easy to follow and the pics that i took came out very nice.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations!
Reviews.Author: CAShumsker
Reviews.Content: This product far exceeded my expectations.  The zoom is amazing!  I gave this to my son for his birthday and created a shutter-bug.

Reviews.Title: Very sharp pictures
Reviews.Author: Richard S. Smith "rockon"
Reviews.Content: It takes great pictures, has too many features for the average person, does not zoom as far as I thought it would but all in all , it is well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Turner
Reviews.Content: It is alot more camera than I need or expected I could get. The camera takes very goog pics and the quality is fantastic. I do not know all of the controls yet but it is great.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!!
Reviews.Author: Randi Winans
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this camera.  This is the third one we have had, with the megapixels getting successively higher with each model.  One of the best things about this camera is the use of AA batteries to power it.  Always readily available no matter where we are.  The quality of the pictures and simplicity make it a favorite.  We have had many larger, more complicated cameras and this one remains the favorite.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Felecia Minor
Reviews.Content: This camera came right on time for me. I was thinking about going to Wal-Mart, but then I thought about the account I have with Amazon. I love the camera & price. This is going to work out just fine for my trip:).

Reviews.Title: Replacement
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement as the the my last one got worn out. Battery door had to be taped up

Reviews.Title: Meets my high expectations
Reviews.Author: Mary Choate
Reviews.Content: I love my camera!  I previously owned a 2003 Fujifilm with similar features, which (as you may expect from it being 10years later in tech advancements) has been far exceeded by the new model.  The only complaint: it came with instructions in several language - none of which were English.  Luckily I am fluent in French! Plus, the camera is pretty intuitive to use, so I didn't need the instructions much to get going.  Also the camera was preprogrammed in Russian, so I had to stumble through the camera settings to figure out how to change the language to English (wasn't too hard: it had the standard symbols next to all the foreign words).  Bit tricky opening the battery/memory card compartment, but its very secure so you never have to worry about it accidentally opening! Overall a great deal for a great camera!

Reviews.Title: My camera arrived defective
Reviews.Author: Carlos Briceño
Reviews.Content: The camera barely lit the flash the asset once and then did nothing more. Please help me to solve the case.

Reviews.Title: Nice For The Price
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: The camera does a really good job. the only thing that I wish they would have done was to make the lens interchangeable. the zoom is nice but it does take a little bit of time to zoom under low light conditions but again for the price it Is a very nice deal.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Lynnette Miller
Reviews.Content: Bought this to take graduation pictures and it was great.  Have to get used to a nice camera this time.  Only thing I didn't like was that there was no English manual.  You have to go onto the cd rom and print it out yourself, three other languages and not one of the manuals were English!

Reviews.Title: Terrific Product at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: wattley
Reviews.Content: I bought one as a gift for a friend and decided to buy one for myself at the same time.  We both love this camera due to the quality of the images and the various options available.  Though I have much to learn in regards to the various options, so far my favorite has been the panoramic photography set up.  I'm very satisfied with this camera.

Reviews.Title: I ordered for my daughter.
Reviews.Author: Marion Martin
Reviews.Content: She loved this camera and it also is a constant item with her. Her pictures are presented on Facebook and they are excellent and her friends really gave her an A plus for the clarity of her pictures.Marion Martin

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Jesse Finney
Reviews.Content: This one is pretty good but I would go for the upgrade if I were buying again. Nice pictures too.

Reviews.Title: Not 'Pro' quality, but for most situations great for my purposes.
Reviews.Author: Steven L. Green
Reviews.Content: This camera is a few steps above 'point and shoot' cameras and for the price, I think an excellent choice. I was disappointed to find neither of the manuals included were in English, but the online version tells me what I need. It has far too many pages to print though. I've printed only what I need at the time.

Reviews.Title: MISSING MANUAL
Reviews.Author: Thomas Hoffmann
Reviews.Content: I Like the camera however there was no instructional manual--- oh yes there were 3 in a foreign languages--go figure!

Reviews.Title: Love It !!!
Reviews.Author: Laura Storey "cruzinstorey"
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure if I wanted to go back to a bigger camera, but I'm glad I did.  It is much easier to hold steady.  I've only had the camera for a week so I am still learning all the features.  I am very happy with it so far.  It is very easy to use and I am very satisfied with the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: B. F.
Reviews.Content: camera is ok but the battery is a pain in the .... so be beware when and if you buy this product.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: patrick henry
Reviews.Content: very happy with the item.took great photos the camera was easy  to use go ahead and get one you will not be sorry.

Reviews.Title: for us lovers of photography.
Reviews.Author: DanSan
Reviews.Content: simple, practice, does not require special batteries, 30 x Super approach, easy to handle for those who are amateur photographers.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Raul Cepero
Reviews.Content: This camera is the best camera for the price, you can expend hole lot of money a get the same quality.The Fujifilm S4500 Digital Camera is a great deal and great camera.Easy to use and understand.If you don't  believe it just buy one and you will see.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: ZeroWorries
Reviews.Content: I'm literally amazed at the lens quality, and overall functionality. Raised edges on moon craters are clearly visible, even with hand held night photos. I would have to be a professional photographer to step up to DSLR, considering both price and inconvenience of multiple lenses.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: AZ Tony
Reviews.Content: This camera performs as it has been advertised, and produces great pictures. It gives you also the options to use manual settings when you have become comfortable to do so.A grat camera overall!

Reviews.Title: Starter camera
Reviews.Author: Deborah l Strain
Reviews.Content: My daughter wanted a new camera for Christmas and this not only had great reviews, but it was less expensive than getting it at a local store.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: I know the product so I am very pleased with the purchase made.The service and the response of the stock, very good, that is fast and efficient so I'm very happy as a consumer

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: shanna
Reviews.Content: its a great cam it didnt come with the peices to connect to the computer with...but it takes great pics.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Susan L. Hire
Reviews.Content: The camera takes good pictures, it had everything included in the pkg. the instruction book was not much detail, I had to get on the internet & print  how to use it. I would recomend it .

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Russell Ohara
Reviews.Content: This thing is great, it was shipped so quickly,i highly recommend this camera.  Very impressed, i would order again,no dobut.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with all the options of this camera. Takes good pictures in all different  settings. Price is a great bonus.

Reviews.Title: Good Backup
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Dompe "Dr. Bob"
Reviews.Content: A backup for my Nikon D300.  Easy to carry.  Better than the Fujifilm I had 10 years ago.  Arrived in good shape and on schedule.

Reviews.Title: o.k.
Reviews.Author: Humberto Diaz A.
Reviews.Content: all o.k. great product. function normally and i like your goods. manufactures is o.k. i will buy in the future other products.

Reviews.Title: Its alright
Reviews.Author: sam
Reviews.Content: Its really hard to get the camera to focus at night. I use it to take pictures during parties and most of the time the pictures come out blurry. During the day takes nice pictures. Maybe its because I still do not know how to use it well. otherwise its alright i mean dont compare it with a Cannon. Oh one more thing i didnt like that you cant manually focus the camera compared to other but as i said its alright.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera but.....
Reviews.Author: Lubricator
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital CameraThe camera is fine.  However, the software that came with it sucks.  Also the basic manual is lacking in depth.  I recommend downloading the manual from the Fujifilm web site.  It is much easier to read on the computer.  It might be a good idea to print it.  Be advised there are 131 pages to the downloaded manual for this S4200 camera.  I gave it 4 stars because the movies could be better.

Reviews.Title: My Fujifilm Finepix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Manuel Mercedes "manuel6440"
Reviews.Content: This is my first Fujifilm camera, because all my past were sony. This camera is very easy to take photos.The only problem is the battery life is very short and the photo quality is no so good like the sony's cameras that I had.

Reviews.Title: Breaks easily & Fuji will not admit fault
Reviews.Author: fverter "fverter"
Reviews.Content: I paid $180 for this camera and gave it to my teenage daughter as a birthday gift in July 2012.  She used it a lot on a tripod to take videos of herself and friends dancing, which she uploaded to YouTube. She loved it. But then, within 3 months the lens stopped zooming in and out properly. Simultaneously, the view screen went black. I checked that the warranty was for one year, so I shipped it back. Fuji is claiming it is "impact damage" and wants $150 to "repair it", which is what the camera sells for now. I am not repairing it and our next camera will not be Fuji.

Reviews.Title: Flash failed to fire
Reviews.Author: Wickscraft
Reviews.Content: I used the camera for about 10 minutes and couldn't get the flash to fire at all. That seems to be a regular problem with the Fujifilm FinePix S4XXX series. Back to Amazon it goes. Otherwise, it seemed to be a great little camera, but I do need the flash to work.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the time.
Reviews.Author: SS Sally
Reviews.Content: Every picture taken with this camera is blurry. I made several adjustments with no luck. Also, camera kept corrupting the SD card.

Reviews.Title: quit working
Reviews.Author: Mike Kautz
Reviews.Content: The first time I plugged it in it quit working I have sent it back to Amazon for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Acceptable
Reviews.Author: Gene B
Reviews.Content: Large camera with many features that cannot be used by a novice photographer.  If you aren't familiar with photographic terminology ..... don't buy this camera.  Purchase one that is simpler to use.

Reviews.Title: FujifilmS4500 review
Reviews.Author: ALIDA RUIZ "Alida in Colorado"
Reviews.Content: I received my camera 8 weeks ago.  I bought this $150 camera based on the great reviews and the fact I wanted a camera with an optical viewfinder for shooting in bright sunlight.  I'm not a pro but the photo quality is far superior to my old Fuji S2000HD which I paid twice as much for.  Unfortunately the S4500 comes with a really flimsy strap.  I attached it as instructed on the manual.  The other day, the strap slipped loose, the camera fell on my tile floor.  I thought I'd busted it because I'd turn it on and it would turn off immediately.  Turns out I just needed to recharge the batteries and it's back to being a SUPER camera - I LOVE the quality of the pictures.  I also use it to video my dog training sessions.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: skippy
Reviews.Content: I like the camera and it has many useful features. But, I have not figured out how to edit the videos taken with it. The articles say you can edit in camera. All I can get it to do is play and pause. I can not get it to trim the video. How do you do it?

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: George Shaffer
Reviews.Content: For an amateur casual user, like me,  this is a really cool camera for the money..  Easy to use and the pics are fabulous.I have not installed the software yet to try it.  Mostly bundles software with cameras is pain in the but advertizing and trying to control your PC stuff.  But this is the first new camera I have purchased in about 3 years and I am very pleased ....

Reviews.Title: Shipped promptly.  Good Service
Reviews.Author: Deb Dobbs
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift, according to the "wish list", so I assume that is the product he wanted, and will be satisfactory

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: phlox
Reviews.Content: Great camera easy to operate. The only problem I had was in the on and off switch after 3 days of use it got stuck in the off position.  I have to manipulate the switch manually to get the camera to turn on.  unfortunately, I did not take the warranty on the camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!!!!
Reviews.Author: dewbabyt
Reviews.Content: Love this camera...read all the review prior to purchase and am very happy with the quality of pictures and video it takes.

Reviews.Title: But for the price...
Reviews.Author: hookworm
Reviews.Content: Yeah, it's not great in low light. If you want a good, consumer grade (or higher end) camera you may want to look into a Canon, any Canon but I've always been a fan of Fuji cameras like this. I had the 3100 before this. Their inexpensive, they zoom (reasonably) and they do work well if you learn how to use it. You can't go into this comparing it to a $500-$600 camera and you can't really compare it to a compact $100-150 camera that doesn't have the same functionality. I know this might not be a helpful review, but if you get this for a good price you may like it. If you've had better cameras before you probably wont like it. Of course it's not compact and, again, it does not work well in low light.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Frank J Calandra
Reviews.Content: Great price but the zoomed pictures were out of focus.  It would have been a good deal.  Not sure why it didn't work in zoom.

Reviews.Title: Muy buena opción por ese precio
Reviews.Author: Nestor
Reviews.Content: Es una muy buena cámara, elegida principalmente por la cantidad de características similares a las cámaras profesionales. Posee una muy buena optica y un zoom más que suficiente para tomas hechas por no profesionales. La calidad de las imagenes es buena.La recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: sbrennan630
Reviews.Content: I've loved using this camera. The one thing I learned is that the flash mode is pretty important. So I ususally use the flash for every picture, even if I'm taking pictures outside. Other than that, it's great.  It takes great pictures, it's easy to use, and it's very economical.

Reviews.Title: Is so better than the older
Reviews.Author: orlando paez salcedo
Reviews.Content: This camera have a lot of new filters, I select the mode and it take soft skin, suggest flash, have a lot of new things.

Reviews.Title: super
Reviews.Author: mario bello
Reviews.Content: lo maximo fotos exelentes alcance increible fotos de la luna con buena nitides y colores efectos y rendimientos de primera

Reviews.Title: she is back
Reviews.Author: Marcel
Reviews.Content: used to have one of this but after a couple of years it stop working properly and the warranty didn't the damage. now that i have it back, i can feel complete= SBK+CAMARA+ROAD!! awesome thx!!

Reviews.Title: flash does not work
Reviews.Author: johnny
Reviews.Content: just received this camera today. was not able to get the flash to work. read the manual, and looked online. setup and selected flash as stated in the manual, flash did not work in auto in the dark. also did not work when selected full time flash. i guess i will be buying one from a retail store so if there is an issue i can get it taken care of immediately and not have to wait for amazon to receive the camera before i am credited. was looking forward to using it on vacation next week. i know it is not amazons fault but i do need a camera quickly.

Reviews.Title: Cant Focus! Always YELLOW with Sepia OFF!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Crumpler
Reviews.Content: Nothing I shot was white... No I didnt have it on sepia tone. No matter what I shot it all looked like I had a yellow filter on it. Also whats the point of having a camra thats has a redictulus zoom on a camra if it cant focus on what its zooming on.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: J. L Smith "lny5"
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital CameraI received the camera and was very excited because I had read previous reviews. I usually buy Canon Cameras but the price was very good on the Fuji Camera. I currently order a small Fuji and it has always worked well.I received the camera and got it all set up, took a couple pictures to check out the zoom and to see how it looks. I then put it back in the bag because I bought this camera for vacations and other important pictures. I got it out about a week later to read and understand more about this camera and the batteries were dead?? I replaced batteries and reset up the date and time, etc. Went thru the camera and the manual. Put it away. Was getting ready for vacation so I got the camera out to make sure it was ready and again the batteries were dead. I called Fujifilm and they didn't know what was wrong with the camera and told me to send it in. I took it on vacation first and then sent it in to be fixed. I bought this camera in July 2012 and sent it in September 2012. Now I get a note saying the parts are not under warranty??? Most all products have a year long warranty. VERY DISAPPOINTED and will never buy Fuji cameras again.

Reviews.Title: Booo
Reviews.Author: andy yoon
Reviews.Content: Poor thing it didnt work at all when i tried to take pictures at the pool and at the park

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware - Very Poor Quality!!!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Camera was much lower quality than I had hoped. I was looking for an inexpensive entry level camera for a possible new photographer and was very disappointed. My point & shoot and iPhone take much better photos. Wish I would have just spent the money on a nicer camera, especially since I had to pay $30 to send it back! Don't think I'll ever order electronics online again, much better to see the product in person first. Buyer beware!!!

Reviews.Title: It really looks the part
Reviews.Author: bliss
Reviews.Content: Honestly, when I received this camera as I was impressed with the look.  It looked like a real professional camera, but the pictures were not impressive at all. I was disappointed with the video quality.  However, i spent time to learn the camera, and I am now happy with it.You can see sample pictures that were taken with this camera in my book on Amazon. Get  a copy Awesome Photography from Inexpensive CamerasI have also shared a few tips too.The images you'll see in the LCD Viewer  are unimpressive but just a simple touch up on your PC and you will have gotten a great picture.A great camera for shooting close upA great camera for shooting outdoors.If you know the the trick you can get great, impressive videos at 720pIt looks the part which has been inspiration for me.I shared a few tips and sample photography from this camera - get your copy here:Awesome Photography from Inexpensive Cameras

Reviews.Title: Wanted More...
Reviews.Author: Kendra
Reviews.Content: I am not sure what I expected from this camera. I guess I was naively thinking that this would be like a DSLR camera and take amazing photographs. I was wrong. This is like carrying around a giant digital camera, so basically, if you have a decent digital camera, just keep it and don't waste your money on this Fujifilm. I just decided to go for the splurge, even though I wasn't sure, and pay alot for a DSLR camera because that is what I ultimately wanted. I bought the Canon Rebel T4i, and I am NOT disappointed so far. Basically the only reason why I did not like this camera is because it is a typical digital camera only with a bigger body and looks fancier.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: djonesorlando
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera based on the reviews of previous customers.  This camera does not do as well with pictures taken inside with low light.  It's an okay camera but I am not impressed and the camera does not live up to the reviews.

Reviews.Title: Extremely disappointed.
Reviews.Author: timberly
Reviews.Content: I had this same camera only with a weaker zoom and loved it.With this one the photos are cloudy. I'm not sure if this is why it was sodarn cheap.

Reviews.Content: right now cannot fully understand camera, there is a lin in the viewfinder and i havent been able to eliminate it

Reviews.Content: wonderful camera lot of functions has good has a high end it's good if you have not had one before

Reviews.Author: Julio
Reviews.Content: Damaged camera. It couldn't be fixed. I just made 6 pictures and camera died. I couldn't find guarantee support in Venezuela. I only found authorized technical service and they told me that internal circuits were burned.

Reviews.Title: damaged flash
Reviews.Author: Pedro
Reviews.Content: I'm from Venezuela and the camera have flash damaged, I can not return it by the returns policy. sorry but bad

Reviews.Title: It's barely OK
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Kyte
Reviews.Content: Pros:  -Lightweight - fits easily for traveling  -uses regular batteries so no charging 'specialty batteries'  -can use either viewfinder or LED screen  -easy to use panormama pictures although it dictates where and when you can close shutterCons:  -zoom, especially in video mode, is jerky and not controllable  -very difficult to set settings other than automatic settings  -not very clear for a 14 mp!  -camera cannot decide what to focus on in video mode and you cannot change the settings for video mode  -poorly written and very incomplete manual  -sometimes sound 'takes itself off'  -poor performance in low light  -no night opportunities  -zoom in video mode is very short (not as long as in picture mode)  -nothing can be changed in a fast or quick manner  -color faded and always over-bright for setting, especially compared to Canon cameras  -colors tend to 'bleed', not sharp

Reviews.Title: fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: jay bee
Reviews.Content: wish: http://www.real-wishes.com S4200 Digital Camera great shape a very good website that i think everybody will love it i promise im sue of it

Reviews.Title: Have not used yet.
Reviews.Author: Janice W. Bowes
Reviews.Content: Thought we could use right out of the box but needed a memory card.  Bought one that was recommended as compatible but camera did not recognize it.  Due to personal health issues have not been able to check about resolving issue.  Will take to local camera shop soon to see if they can help me.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: MStaver
Reviews.Content: I ended up buying the Panasonic LUMIX ZS19 which I love and think takes much higher quality photos and has a much faster shutter speed than this fujifilm.  So if you want a super-zoom (20X optical) spend the extra money, if you want to spend $100 get a small point and shoot that doesn't try to have super-zoom which ends up sucking.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good Camera
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: I can't say to much about this camera, since I've only been playing with it for a few weeks.  I taken several hundred shots, may be more.  Their's a lot of thing to figure out!  The flash doesn't work all the time, especially when you what it too, you'll have to wait or just take another picture with no flash, and then take one when it decides to flash.  The camera on my Iphone takes some better pictures in many cases.  This Fuji Camera take some pretty good ones as well, some come out even better then my Iphone.  I guess I'd have to say, after writing this review, and thinking about it! that this  Fuji Camera isn't really worth bothering with, at least for me.  The reason I say this is, it's so much easier to point an shoot my Iphone, it's always in my hand anyway.  The picture usually come out just as good, if not better then this Fuji Camera.  I bought this Fuji Camera to take better pictures then what I already have, but it's beginning to sink in my head, that maybe it's just to much effort.  I can't stick it in my pocket, and I have to be really careful with, this Fuji Camera, and it not all that easy to hold.  You have to wear it around your neck, and if your doing something like changing your baby boy's diaper, and you have no safe place to put it down, well you just have to make do.  Like wearing it around your neck, and my boy grabs it all the time, very frustrating!  It's still a really nice camera, but I might be better off looking for something in the 4 to 5 hundred dollar range, then it might be worth it!!!  Then the pictures hopefully would be awesome…

Reviews.Title: exelente  camara
Reviews.Author: antonio
Reviews.Content: excellent camera brand special discounts for which you want to start a profecion as photography, good image, focus, I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Shad
Reviews.Content: I own an older generation of this camera and loved it!  I bought it one day and took it to Europe the next with little knowledge on how it worked.  I had no problems with the older camera on that trip as it was very easy to figure out how to use the settings and it took fantastic photos!  When the knob broke off days before my vacation last month I had a panic attack as I wasn't up on the latest cameras and little to no free time to go camera shopping.  When I saw there was a new generation of the FujiFilm I have owned for 5 years, I decided to buy it given how happy I had been with the original FujiFilm that I owned.  When I opened the box and powered it on, there was a thick white line down the middle of the display on the back of the camera so I called Fuji tech support.  The person I spoke to quickly informed me there was nothing that could be done.  He said it was damaged and to return it!  He did me a favor with his advice.  I was actually disappointed at how flimsy the new generation of this camera had become.  The case is cheap plastic and I feel strongly it could easily crack without much trauma to it.  My old camera was well made and held up after many trips in which I took hundreds of photos each time. I packaged the new camera up and sent it back to Amazon the next day.  I ended up with a Canon PowerShot SX500 IS which operates much the same way as the FujiFilm I originally owned.  It is constructed of much heavier materials and takes terrific photos.  I would recommend the Cannon as it's well worth it.  I was very disappointed in the FujiFilm camera.  If you buy it you won't be happy.  Holding it in your hands you can tell it's cheaply made and probably doesn't have much of a lifespan.  I feel badly that I'm writing this review after owning the older model which I absolutely loved, but I felt I needed to so no one else makes the same mistake, especially if they are in a time crunch and need a camera quickly.  This is not the camera you are looking for.  I hope FujiFilm figures out that they've cheapened a great camera and make it right with the next model.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Lori Kimball
Reviews.Content: I am not having good luck with the pictures clarity, often blurry an not at all what I was expecting. Have been looking for box it came in hoping to return it :-(. My old camera works so much better, so I have been using it to capture my new puppies photo's an videos.

Reviews.Title: Frustrated
Reviews.Author: Janice B.
Reviews.Content: I have never written a review before, but so far I have been frustrated with this product.  It took two weeks for it to arrive and when it did it came with three owner's manuals, none in English.  I thought maybe as inconvenient as it would be the instructions would be on the CD it came with.  But the best I can find that is not the case either.  I have figured out some components, because I understand minimal German, but I NEED a manual in English to fully understand how to use all of bells and whistles, which is why I bought this camera.Fujifilm FinePix S4200 Digital Camera

Reviews.Author: david v moshinsky
Reviews.Content: picture  oks just not bad for the money  wish I went for a better camera I usually do but seemed to be ok

Reviews.Author: Richard L. Fish "Gregory Pike-pen name"
Reviews.Content: This particular model does not have time stamp on it. I wanted it for court proceedings. Will just take the camera to court, as the date does show on each picture, but will not print it.

Reviews.Content: i have this camerait was a gift from my pastorsand i really luv itbt the only problem was the camera doesnt flashi thought maybe it would once i get used 2 itbt boy was i ever wrongit didnt flash at alli didnt even use the flash nt ever

Reviews.Title: dissapointed
Reviews.Author: saleem
Reviews.Content: I was very eager to get the product, shipping was good, but I was really dis appointed when it was not working, it switches on and immediately went off. they took back without any shipping charge and returned the money back very soon.

Reviews.Author: amaturephotogropher
Reviews.Content: dont even think im a agent im a kid 12 love this camere i know a lot about photogrophey and dont even look at diffret cameras i love it works pro  and betifiul qualty

Reviews.Title: do not purchase
Reviews.Author: Brandi B
Reviews.Content: After seeing that this camera received high stars I bought if BIG MISTAKE!  I read the manual and used it to shoot my family for fall pics.  Over half came out blurry I chalked it up to me not knowing all the tricks.  After taking a 5 year olds photo session and a wedding I was sooooo sick of this camera I sent it back.  This camera should have been easy to use and it was as long as you like very blurry picture.  Also the camera felt cheap and the battery door was flimsy.  I would not purchase this camera. Fyi Amazon was fabulous with my return the girl on the IM chat was super.

Reviews.Title: Hmm
Reviews.Author: Purchaser #1 "Drew"
Reviews.Content: Due to the snowstorm in NY i haven't received the camera as yet. I hope soon the carriers would deliver it.

Reviews.Title: Should have auto flash on button.
Reviews.Author: Glenn Anaya
Reviews.Content: First of all, I was impressed with this thing. Considering the price and its so handy. A lots of features.Secondly, after setting up. I noticed that I can't find on how to turn on the flash. I almost loose my patience just to look for the auto flash on.lastly, I'm asking help on how to automatically turn on the flash aside from the flash button release. It should be in menu but I can't find it.1 stars for this thing. I will return this to amazon.

Reviews.Title: camera flash defective
Reviews.Author: Lobrito
Reviews.Content: I can define this camera with one word... Manual, i compared it with several cameras.. and this is very manual you can adjust a lot of things, like aperture, shooting time, iso, you can play with this options to create great pictures... you arent limited by the scenes like "fireworks, beach, night scene" you can create your own scene depending in what you want... you can get a lot of effects... i am a fujifilm s4000 user, and this camera its the same, just have less lcd resolution, and the texture of the case... i cant stay quiet and knowing that there is people watching this camera and doesnt know what they can do, or why this is better than others cameras like l810...so if you are an amateur, pro, or you want to learn more about photography i think this camera will help you, has a lot of manual settings... and 30 x zoom! perfect for baseball, soccer games... to make a movie zooming the players, taking moon photos.this camera has an electronic viewfinder... very usefull in sunny days... very nice, i think you should try with fuji... i read a lot and bought s4000 3 month ago, im very happy... try fuji!

Reviews.Author: Allegro Winds
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as a S4250 from Walmart. Took it out of the box put batteries in, inserted memory card, turned it on and had no image. All the menus would work but nothing in the view finder from the lens. My daughter was devastated her Christmas present didn't work. She had to leave the next morning and did not have her camera for her trip 6 states away to see her relatives Fugifilm better make this good.
